MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon affecting properties in Cibyn Industrial Estate and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a faulty piece of overhead line equipment and our team are now working to get your power back on via generator as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:05pm on the 13th November 2020.
